subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: James Blake struggled yesterday but advanced to the final of the ATP Countrywide Classic in Los Angeles, defeating Hyung-Taik Lee of South Korea, 6-3, 4-6, 6-3. Blake will face Radek Stepanek of the Czech Republic, who advanced when Nicolas Kiefer of Germany withdrew because of a sore knee.
